Text:
- Video and Audio Codec supports PS3
- Change MKV File Container with MKV2VOB for PS3 playback

Note: I found playback on the PS3 was a little strange, the audio was off by half a second or something. This could have been a one time issue though.
Movist on mac crashes when i try to open it. Also, i can't play GR subs on my media center..Any idea?
